values.name: if()
values.prose: The if() function allows authors to set a property value (or parts thereof) to different values based on certain conditions.
values.value: if( <condition>, <consequent> [, <antecedent>]?) <consequent> Info about the '<consequent>' definition.#typedef-consequentReferenced in: 3.
